name: WP Link Builder
author: WP LinkBuilder by shopmunity GmbH, Germany

sections.description:
The WP Link Builder plugin detects and promotes your backlinks: “This is like SEO on autopilot”.
WP Link Builder detects the backlinks your visitors come from and sends them to indexing services, so search engines can find them and credit your website with link juice.

Check out WP Link Builder

How WP Link Builder works for you on autopilot:

  • If someone linked to one of your website’s posts on his website and a user clicked on that link, she would of course be forwarded to your post.
  • All browsers store the so called “referrer”, which contains the previous website the user visited before navigating to your post.
  • This referrer is then evaluated by the WP Link Builder plugin on your website and the referring URL is extracted and stored in your WordPress database.
  • From there it can be automatically (or manually) forwarded to so called indexing services.
  • Those indexing services are crawled very often by search engines and while doing so, the search engines will get notified about the referring URL.
  • At a later point the search engines will then also crawl that referring URL and find your backlink on it, hence your website will be credited with link juice!

WP Link Builder can perform all of these actions 100% on auto pilot.

If you want to learn more, visit WP Link Builder
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘wplinkbuilder’
  3. Install WP Link Builder from the WordPress directory
  4. Activate WP Link Builder from your plugins page

From WordPress.org

  1. Download WP Link Builder.
  2. Upload the “wp_linkbuilder” directory to your “/wp-content/plugins/” directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate WP Link Builder from your plugins page

Configuring the plugin

  1. After activating the plugin a “WP Link Builder” link will be added to the admin menu
  2. Clicking that link to visit the plugin’s dashboard
  3. Start the configuration wizard which will guide you through the settings process
  4. You need to enable the link promotion feature before the plugin can promote your backlinks
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘wplinkbuilder’
  3. Install WP Link Builder from the WordPress directory
  4. Activate WP Link Builder from your plugins page

From WordPress.org

  1. Download WP Link Builder.
  2. Upload the “wp_linkbuilder” directory to your “/wp-content/plugins/” directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate WP Link Builder from your plugins page

Configuring the plugin

  1. After activating the plugin a “WP Link Builder” link will be added to the admin menu
  2. Clicking that link to visit the plugin’s dashboard
  3. Start the configuration wizard which will guide you through the settings process
  4. You need to enable the link promotion feature before the plugin can promote your backlinks

Where can I get support?

Just visit us on https://wplinkbuilder.com/support/?utm_source=wordpress_org_support&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=plugin_free and ask your question.

Is WP Link Builder compatible to other SEO plugins?

Yes, WP Link Builder is built in a way that it does not conflict with any other plugin. It was explicitly tested to be compatible with popular SEO plugins and tools like:
Yoast SEO, All in One SEO Pack, Broken link checker, SEO Friendly Images, SEO Ultimate, The SEO Framework, SEO Redirection Plugin, SEO Post Content Links, Broken Link Checker, etc.
